#How to build bob-the-builder
= Introduction =

The chore of setting up a plugin project to build is quite [http://zeroturnaround.com/articles/building-eclipse-plug-ins-with-maven-3-and-tycho/ daunting]. This is where [http://www.eclipse.org/tycho/ Tycho] comes to the rescue.
 
bob-the-builder leverages tycho to build the artifacts.

  # check the project:

}}}
